text: Ernst Träger (29 January 1926 – 25 January 2015) was a German judge. He was a judge in the Federal Constitutional Court of Germany between 1977 and 1989. He was born in Berlin, Germany. Träger died in Berlin, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:German judges Category:People from Berlin
title: Ernst Träger
